title: Kyou kara, Kimi wo Share Shimasu
original_name: 今日から、君をシェアします
sinopse:
Akari's grandmother told her to move out of their house and live at a new place. Turns out the place his moving in is a share house with 4 hot guys living in it. In exchange for free rent, Akari's grandmother wants these four to make her into a better woman. Will they be able to transform Akari into one?

(Source: MU)
